spells.name: Break Enchantment
spells.description: Frees subjects from enchantments, transmutations, and curses.

spells.name: Dismissal
spells.description: Forces a creature to return to its native plane.

spells.name: Mage's Private Sanctum
spells.description: Prevents anyone from viewing or scrying an area for 24 hours.

spells.name: Cloudkill
spells.description: Kills 3 HD or less; 4–6 HD save or die, 6+ HD take Con damage.

spells.name: Mage's Faithful Hound
spells.description: Phantom dog can guard a location and attack intruders.

spells.name: Major Creation
spells.description: As minor creation, plus stone and metal.

spells.name: Planar Binding, Lesser
spells.description: Traps extraplanar creature of 6 HD or less until it performs a task.

spells.name: Secret Chest
spells.description: Hides expensive chest on Ethereal Plane; you retrieve it at will.

spells.name: Summon Monster V
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Teleport
spells.description: Instantly transports you as far as 100 miles per level.

spells.name: Wall of Stone
spells.description: Creates a stone wall that can be shaped.

spells.name: Contact Other Plane
spells.description: Lets you ask question of extraplanar entity.

spells.name: Prying Eyes
spells.description: 1d4 + 1/level floating eyes scout for you.

spells.name: Telepathic Bond
spells.description: Link lets allies communicate.

spells.name: Dominate Person
spells.description: Controls humanoid telepathically.

spells.name: Feeblemind
spells.description: Subject's Int and Cha drop to 1.

spells.name: Hold Monster
spells.description: As hold person, but any creature.

spells.name: Mind Fog
spells.description: Subjects in fog get –10 to Wis and Will checks.

spells.name: Symbol of Sleep
spells.description: Triggered rune puts nearby creatures into catatonic slumber.

spells.name: Cone of Cold
spells.description: 1d6/level cold damage.

spells.name: Interposing Hand
spells.description: Hand provides cover against 1 opponent.

spells.name: Sending
spells.description: Delivers short message anywhere, instantly.

spells.name: Wall of Force
spells.description: Wall is immune to damage.

spells.name: Dream
spells.description: Sends message to anyone sleeping.

spells.name: False Vision
spells.description: Fools scrying with an illusion.

spells.name: Mirage Arcana
spells.description: As hallucinatory terrain, plus structures.

spells.name: Nightmare
spells.description: Sends vision dealing 1d10 damage, fatigue.

spells.name: Persistent Image
spells.description: As major image, but with no concentration required.

spells.name: Seeming
spells.description: Changes appearance of 1 person per 2 levels.

spells.name: Shadow Evocation
spells.description: Mimics evocation below 5th level, but only 20% real.

spells.name: Blight
spells.description: Withers one plant or deals 1d6/level damage to plant creature.

spells.name: Magic Jar
spells.description: Enables possession of another creature.

spells.name: Symbol of Pain
spells.description: Triggered rune wracks creatures with pain.

spells.name: Waves of Fatigue
spells.description: Several targets become fatigued.

spells.name: Animal Growth
spells.description: One animal doubles in size.

spells.name: Baleful Polymorph
spells.description: Turns subject into harmless animal.

spells.name: Beast Shape III
spells.description: You take the form of a Diminutive or Huge animal, or Small or Medium magical beast.

spells.name: Elemental Body II
spells.description: Turns you into a Medium elemental.

spells.name: Fabricate
spells.description: Transforms raw materials into finished items.

spells.name: Overland Flight
spells.description: You fly at a speed of 40 ft. and can hustle over long distances.

spells.name: Passwall
spells.description: Creates passage through wood or stone wall.

spells.name: Plant Shape I
spells.description: Turns you into a Small or Medium plant.

spells.name: Polymorph
spells.description: Gives one willing subject a new form.

spells.name: Telekinesis
spells.description: Moves object, attacks creature, or hurls object or creature.

spells.name: Transmute Mud to Rock
spells.description: Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.

spells.name: Transmute Rock to Mud
spells.description: Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.

spells.name: Permanency
spells.description: Makes certain spells permanent.
